extendedInfo.description: The Drivewyze PreClearâ¢ app enables commercial truck drivers to bypass Drivewyze-supported inspection sites or weigh stations. Youâll save time, money and fuel.  On average, you can expect to receive bypass permissions between 50% - 75% of the time, no matter what your carrier safety score. And if you have a very good carrier safety score, you may could receive bypasses up to 98% of the time. Drivewyze PreClear is supported in 16 statesâcheck out the list in the tour to see if it is available where you drive.If you want to spend less time waiting at weigh stations and more time driving, Drivewyze PreClear is for you.  Hereâs how it works.  It uses Android GPS technology to automatically detect upcoming weigh stations.  If youâre encountering a Drivewyze-supported site, the service alerts you when your vehicle is 2 miles from the station.  One mile out, the app notifies you to either bypass or follow road signs.  Itâs that easy.   Drivewyze PreClear turns your smartphone or tablet into a next generation bypass transponder.Drivewyze PreClear does not require any additional hardware, aside from your smartphone or tablet. Download the app to begin a 60-day, hassle free trial and start receiving bypasses.  The app walks you through the enrollment process.  You just enter your license plate # and DOT registration, and snap a photo of your truck.  When you approach your first Drivewyze-supported weigh station, youâll be instructed to pull-in to activate your account.  After that, youâll start receiving bypasses.   Youâll see for yourself the time and hassles you save.  At the end of your free trial, simply set up your subscription to keep receiving bypasses.Requirements:Users must also have active cellular data connection and allow access to GPS.Drivewyze PreClear Supported States: Arkansas, Connecticut, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Maryland, Minnesota, Mississippi, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Mexico, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Vermont, Virginia, West VirginiaFor a complete list of active sites, please visit http://drivewyze.com/coverage-map/.Keywords:weigh station, truck services, inspection sites, trucker app, trucking, weigh station locator, fleet optimization, truck driver, e-screening, transportation, intrastate, interstate, pull-in, FMCSA compliant, transponder, DOT, bypass program, Drivewise, Drivewize, Drivewyse, weigh scale, CAT scale, weigh station bypass, prepass, bypass service, trucker, fleet management, commercial vehicle, truck scale, preclearance

reviews.title: Ok...
reviews.comment: No forgot password place? Even on the website? Please add more states. Also prepass is like $17 something a month. And now your charging $15 with not even 20 states supporting? Add lots and lots of states then will think about the expense.
reviews.author: Daniel Searle

reviews.title: Still needs more development
reviews.comment: Worked in TN, didn\'t see any scale in Arkansas. It only works in 12, make that 11 since it is not seeing AR scales, states.  I\'ll buy the subscription when they get more states operational.
reviews.author: David Lavine

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app, works as it says
reviews.author: Mark Jarrell

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: I have used this since it was in Beta. Great improvements since then. Coverage is slowly improving, probably a state issue, not a dryvewize one.
reviews.author: James Guillaume

reviews.title: Perfect for bypassing the Chicken Coops
reviews.comment: Great improvements in the latest release.  As more and more weigh scale sites come on stream the app gets even more valuable. This app has the potential to make the entire industry a lot more productive.
reviews.author: Kelly Frey

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I use it whenever I get to the states its in. Works great. Looking forward to more states.
reviews.author: Kevin Eckhoff

reviews.comment: This will rock the trucking industry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mike  (company driver)
reviews.comment: Love it so  far need more states on I 80 and I 70 corridor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: It allows me to know whenever I\'m close to a weigh station, and if it\'s  participating in the Drivewyze program it\'s possible to bypass it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, easy to understand, a great step forward for the trucking industry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible, useless, hardly works.
reviews.comment: Went with the trial hoping for the best. Huge disappointment. Alert popped up maybe three times, with no bypasses. This thing is so NOT ready for prime time, active weigh station list is laughable, not worth 50 cents/month let alone what they\'re charging. Prepass has nothing to worry about. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Michael Starr
